  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x80
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 100x80
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 91x79
          text run at (0,0) width 84: "Lorem ipsum"
          text run at (0,20) width 89: "dolor sit amet,"
          text run at (0,40) width 71: "consectetur"
          text run at (0,60) width 91: "adipiscing elit."
